articles.description:
RT ibnzUK.eth 🍥
It is funny and actually scary how my life turned arround after Joining @developer_dao
I am working in London with NGOs, NPOs and Charities, and we are currently rebuilding backend APIs for our NFT Marketplace with Java. 
:)
